about_the_game:
If you like this game look up "Spooky Crew: Mask of the Mysterium" also on Steam. I have a demo out and I'm working really hard on it!

It's your first day at a new school. Every day is your first day at a new school. Every night the world ends.

Mars Underground is an apocalyptic adventure game where you relive the same day over and over. With each cycle new items can be picked up and topics unlocked.​

Take experimental prescription drugs. Talk to a toilet. Get hit by a car. Humiliate yourself repeatedly. All in the name of figuring out what on earth is going on.

  • Solve brain damaging mysteries.

  • Discover all the potential endings.

  • Find new stuff every cycle.

  • Talk, interact, annoy and generally bother the denizens of Phobos City as they try to go about their day.

  • All original, "dynamic" music soundtrack.

  • Can be fully played with either a keyboard, a controller or touch input.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews:
“Mars Underground is a strange and sometimes unnerving game. But in a way which endears itself to the player.”
94% – Pixel Pop Network

“Accompanied by its killer, deadpan humour, a quirky cast and plenty of great moments, it’s a deftly told and highly involving tale. It comes extremely recommended for those who like the weird, the wild and the fascinating.”
4.5/5 – The AU Review

“This point-and-click adventure without the pointing and clicking features masterful puzzle design, beautiful presentation, and a cast of colourful characters. Mars Underground is simply a joy to play.”
4/5 – OnlySP
short_description: Mars Underground is an apocalyptic adventure where you relive the same day over and over. With each cycle new items can be picked up and topics unlocked.​ Explore the possibilities of this timeloop and uncover multiple endings.
